name: Distant Pillar
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A horizontal pillar of black, gleaming light forms and is launched at a target creature within range you can see. It must make a Dexterity saving throw or suffer 3 Fairylock, take 3d6 bludgeoning and 3d6 radiant damage, and be knocked backwards 30 feet. A successful saving throw deals half damage and prevents all other effects.

Fairylock remains for 1 minute after its most recent application. For every AP a creature spends, it takes 1 damage per Fairylock it has.
empower: If cast after another Fairylock spell, remove the AP cost on this spell.
